__e: I know you really care about her, but... what you really need is someone you can count on.
You care more about some girl you don't even know having a good time at prom than your own son!
Look, I know you cared about her a lot, but you said it yourself.
I know you really care about her, but... what you really need is someone you can count on.
You care more about some girl you don't even know having a good time at prom than your own son!
Look, I know you cared about her a lot, but you said it yourself.
I don't hear so much as boo from you all this time, and you're telling me you care about me and my dad?
Look, mom, a good time to tell me you cared about me was the day daddy went to prison, not two months later on a postcard from la Cantina Cucaracha in Guadalajara.
So please, don't tell me that you care about me because I don't want that.
I'm sure your Uncle Kenny was fun to hang out with when you were little but do you hang out with him now?
You love him and worry about him for about 18 years... and then maybe you have a right to tell him what to do.
All I say is I know you take care of him.
He once told me that being a lord is like being a father, except you have thousands of children and you worry about all of them.
So please, don't tell me that you care about me because I don't want that.
Look, mom, a good time to tell me you cared about me was the day daddy went to prison, not two months later on a postcard from la Cantina Cucaracha in Guadalajara.
You're worried too much about what other people want you to say.
You worry too much, you should feel free to do what you like.
I'm sorry, I'm just... a bit nervous is all.
I don't know what it is that makes you care so much about other people, but that's not me.
If you worry too much about what he should be able to do by now or what other kids his age are doing, it's going to drive you crazy.
I don't know, but I guess you can come up with something, now that you're here and you care so much about my future and stuff.
I don't know, but I guess you can come up with something, now that you're here and you care so much about my future and stuff.
What you've done to all of us, to the people you claim to care so much about?
If you worry too much about what he should be able to do by now or what other kids his age are doing, it's going to drive you crazy.
I don't know why you don't. Care more about this, mother.
And don't tell me you care more about that kid than I do.
Maybe I should behave more like you just walk out and not think about anything.
Why do not you worry about that your child is sitting in my house when it should be in yours?
You've shown absolutely no concern about what happens to me... what happens to your mother.
So why don't you just do us all a favor and go... take care of this problem?
